item.title: 508 question [simple]

p.teleportTo(2096, 4424, 1, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 1000);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "Welcome to training, n00b!");
}
